entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:27 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 2:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
